requirements: You were born qualified to take this course. No requirements necessary.
As an added bonus I would recommend bringing a compassionate heart, a curious mind and a willing spirit.
courses.description:
Ever noticed that some people turn heads as soon as they step into a business meeting, enter a bar, or climb onto a stage?
In the movie business, it's called having “star quality.”
And while that quality is pretty hard to define, we all know it whenever we see someone who radiates what I call a “1000-watt presence.”
They have that rare ability to elicit admiring glances from onlookers, entice friendly smiles from strangers, and arouse intense engagement from whoever they're speaking with.
If they're a public speaker, their charisma makes audiences sit up and listen.
But not only do they have a commanding presence. For some reason, people also instinctively feel they “click” with them.
The good news is that radiating this sort of mystifying presence is built on a foundation of unshakable confidence, which is something anyone can learn -- with the right teacher.
“Alexa is engaging, has a lot of presence when she speaks, and is so confident that it makes you want to be like her…” — Paulo Knabben, Udemy student
If you believe right now you could never express such a dazzling persona, this course will prove that you’re mistaken.
Hi, I’m Alexa Fischer and I’ve appeared on hit TV shows like Lie to Me, NCIS, CSI, Numb3rs, Bones as well as a whole bunch of television commercials, so I know a bit about what star quality really means. But my greatest endeavor has been to help people rise above their fears and illusory obstacles to achieve their deepest desires.
My background also means I know a lot about why some people end up becoming wallflowers while others shine brilliantly in the company of strangers and acquaintances alike.
So, what’s the secret of a 1000-watt presence?
The core components of this star quality, I’ve discovered over the years, are releasing your fears, connecting to your inner power, and polishing your presence, so you can show up for life’s opportunities (in person, on stage, and even in front of the lens) with authenticity and ease.
In this course, I’ll be breaking down the habits of 1000-watt individuals and showing you how to embed their characteristics so deeply into your being that your own presence sparkles naturally.
I’ll show you how to use your body, voice, and your mindset to make an instant impression on others.
I’ll also give you the tools to maintain a powerful connection with others that will last a lifetime.
Don’t believe it’s possible? I’m here to tell you that it is.
I’ve taught executives, teams, and companies of all sizes how to connect more fully to themselves and each other. From Trader Joe’s and SONY, to Dress For Success and the National Charity League, to an appearance on The Today Show – I’ve empowered thousands of individuals and teams to land new clients, focus their vision and articulate their goals, engage more meaningfully with customers, and communicate better with each other.
I’ve seen students go from hesitation to awesomeness in a matter of weeks.
I can do the same for you too — whether you’re an aspiring instructor, a person wanting to stand out in business, or just someone looking for more dates.
“Just amazing…” — Ahmed Hanafy, Udemy student
“Inspiring…” — Cheryl Loudon, Udemy student
“You very soon become immersed in her performance…” — Anton Knapic, Udemy student
“Lots to think about…” — Dan Halbert, Udemy student
"The world needs more people like her…” — Nicolas Ordonez, Udemy student
“Awesome…” — Pawan Verma, Udemy student
“Really feeling like I can add some value to this world…” — Paula Doherty, Udemy student
Now, I know there are lots of “gurus” out there teaching confidence. What makes this program unique is a step-by-step approach to help you identify and release all the blocks that have been holding you back in the past.
You’ll learn how to:
Identify the habitual way you think, move, and speak (and how to improve!)
Build unshakeable confidence with energy psychology techniques
Enjoy the art of casual conversation, so you can build amazing relationships
Be an incredible salesperson, easily and authentically
Deliver amazing presentations that influence audiences
Be Comfortable on Camera, since video is everywhere....
Join now and dive into over 4.5 hours of on-demand video with a 30-day money-back guarantee. There's no risk and sooooooooo much reward. Join thousands of other students NOW.
See you in class!
“I’ve been a medical analyst on TV for almost a year… this course should have been the first thing I did to prepare. It just made me so much better…” —  Asuppiah Suppiah, Udemy student
“Alexa's energy makes you want to take on the world…” — Jason Turri, Udemy student
“I feel like my best friend is encouraging me to be the most brilliant I can be…” — Padma Wangmo, Udemy student
“The energy that Alexa gives out is amazing and addictive…” Jenny Sullivan, Udemy student
target_audience: Anyone who has ever dreamed of playing big, but lacks the confidence needed
Someone who knows they were put on this planet to make a difference.
A person who is ready to make the leap towards success, but wants a helping hand.
Entrepreneurs, self-starters, and anyone else who needs to pitch themselves and their business.

courses.description:
Facts about this course Public Speaking Course
* This is the Udemy Best-Selling course for Public Speaking
* Highest Rated Udemy Public Speaking course
* More lectures (550) than any other Public speaking course
* More comprehensive content than any other public speaking course (nearly twice as long-31 hours!-as any other Udemy Public speaking course)


Public Speaking - You can come across as comfortable, confident, and relaxed when public speaking--even when facing tough questions or a crisis! Imagine knowing that you are going to deliver the exact message you want in every presentation. Careers are made and lost by both good and bad presentation performances. Why risk even one more day when you could be asked to speak to an audience without knowing how public speaking works?
For more than 30 years, TJ Walker has conducted media training for Presidents of countries, Prime Ministers, and CEOs of publicly-traded companies on how to give public presentations effectively. Now, you can learn from the same insights at a fraction of the cost.  You will learn every aspect of public speaking including how to look your best on camera (and not let it add 20 pounds to your body). You will master the art of messaging, answering questions, and most importantly, how to package and deliver your message to your audience. After completing this course, you will know how to get the exact message you want to be remembered by your audience.  Enroll in the 2025 Complete Public Speaking Masterclass today.  There is a 100% Money-Back Guarantee for this public speaking course. And the instructor also provides an enhanced guarantee.

courses.description:
Body Language is always on. Imagine that every time you stand or sit to speak, you appear supremely confident, relaxed and authoritative. Every movement your body makes conveys the message you want it to. Imagine never having to wonder what to do with your hands or how to stand or move when you are giving a presentation.
You can be a master of your own Body Language. Today.
In this Body Language course, you will learn what to do with your hands, body and face so that you will look confident and relaxed in front of your speaking audience. You won't have to wonder if you look nervous, scared or unprofessional any longer. Even if you are scared, you will learn how to look completely relaxed in front of any speaking audience.
Why go through one more meeting or presentation worried that you don't look or sound your best? Sign up for this Body Language course today.
What will students achieve or be able to do after taking this Body Language course?
*Looking comfortable when speaking
*Not feeling anxious while speaking
*Knowing how to move your hands, feet, and body in a presentation

courses.description:
Presentation Skills and Public Speaking Skills are the most important personal skills you can ever develop for your success in life. Life is a series of presentations. Those who develop strong presentation skills and public speaking skills do well in school, secure jobs, and promotions and often ascend to the highest levels of leadership in corporations, governments, and civic life. People who fail to develop presentation skills often have their careers stagnate or plateau in the mid-range. Sadly, presentation skills are either not taught in primary or secondary education or are taught poorly.
The Complete Presentation Skills Masterclass for Every Occasion course is your way to get a Master's level education on how to present effectively. You will receive in-depth training on every aspect of  Presentation Skills - Public Speaking - Communication Skills - Storytelling Skills - PowerPoint - Confidence on Camera
This course is designed to be a one-stop-shop for all your presentation skills and public speaking skills training needs.
This course has the following:
More lectures on presentation skills than any other course on Udemy, by far.
More hours of training than any other course (29 hours long. Sometimes More is More!)
More in-depth training techniques than any other course.


"I've devoted the last 30 years of my life conducting live, in-person presentation skills and public speaking skills to Presidents, Prime Ministers, CEOs, Entrepreneurs, Senators, Nobel Peace Prize Winners, and Professional Athletes. Now, I'm excited to bring to you these same insider secrets that will transform you into an excellent presenter. If you take this course and do a few simple homework assignments, I am absolutely convinced I can make your presentation skills world-class. You WILL be able to do the following in EVERY Presentation:
Look comfortable, confident, and relaxed, regardless of whether you are sitting or standing, regardless of audience size.
Present so your audience understands you.
Present so your audience remembers your messages (this is the hardest part).
Influence your audience to take the actions you want.
TJ Walker, President of Media Training Worldwide and best-selling Udemy Instructor.
“TJ Walker's single-minded devotion to presentation has made him the #1 expert for executives seeking guidance on speaking to the public and media." Bob Bowdon, Anchor/Reporter, Bloomberg Television
“TJ Walker is the leading media trainer in the world." Stu Miller, Viacom News Producer
(TJ Walker's Media Training Worldwide) “The world's leading presentation and media training firm." Gregg Jarrett, Fox News Channel Anchor
TJ Walker is the founder of Media Training Worldwide and has been conducting presentation skills, public speaking skills, and communication skills training workshops and seminars since 1984. Walker has trained Presidents of countries, Prime Ministers, Nobel Peace Prize winners, Super Bowl winners, US Senators, Miss Universes, and Members of Parliament. He has conducted presentation skills and communication skills workshops on six continents in more than three dozen countries.
His book, "Secret to Foolproof Presentations" was a USA Today # 1 Bestseller, as well as a Wall Street Journal, and Business Week Bestseller.
Walker is also the author of "Media Training AZ" and "Media Training Success."

Presentation Skills - Public Speaking - Communication Skills - Storytelling Skills - Confidence on Camera
Walker's Facebook page "TJ Walker Speak to Influence" is the #1 page for 7-day a week video tutorial on how to be a better public speaker and communicator.
In 2009, Walker set the Guinness Book of World Records for Most Talk Radio Appearances ever in a 24 hour period.
Walker has also served as a former President of the National Speakers Association, New York City.
Presentation Skills - Public Speaking - Communication Skills - Storytelling Skills - PowerPoint - Confidence on Camera - Media Training
